you definitely see it on Manhattan the
Central Park goes dark with the big

to each other because we as astronauts
see that everywhere the the weird sort
of split of how it looks natural but
then the light points out exactly where
the people have left the lights on and
to see the two in such a heavily
populated area I thought was really
instructional as well as self reflective
of our fear of the dark
